Nick's Blog

Audio and Video posts in MovableType

19 March 2006

I picked up an isight today and am really ready to get back into videocasting and podcasting. I made my obligatory first videocast and used a really cool plugin called MTEnclosures to publish the enclosures in my rss feed.

I'm going to really try to make every 3rd or so post a video or audio post so subscribe to my feed in iTunes and keep tuned.
